content: When the Incas were conquered by the Spanish about four hundred years ago, some of the Incas left Cuzco and went to Machu Picchu in the heart of Peru.
translations: ita:Quando gli Incas furono conquistati dagli spagnoli circa 400 anni fa, alcuni degli Incas Cuzco lasciarono e andarono a M
